title: Sci-Fi Weapon Sound Effects Collection
description: A set of 241 futuristic weapon sound effects.
longDescription:
A set of 241 futuristic weapon sound effects.


This set includes ballistic, energy, biological weapons as well as explosives and experimental technology.
